bio: ''You must be the change you wish to see in the world'' UTD Computer Science Blue Light Pictures Director/Producer/Editor/Writer/Cinematographer XO Communications - Software Developer by day, Filmmaker by night! well, not just night. I always look for opportunity to make films... watch films and learning from them... it's my passion! If you have the same passion, circle me then we'll share ideas!!!
